publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2582.2 Ms Wendy Alexander: Scottish Economy-As an amendment to motion (S1M-2582) in the name of Miss Annabel Goldie, leave out from first "notes" to end and insert "endorses the work undertaken by the Executive in its handling of the Scottish economy within the context of a continuing stable UK economic performance; commends the work undertaken by the Executive to help improve performance of the Scottish economy as set out in the Framework for Economic Development and Smart Successful Scotland; commends the work undertaken by the Executive to assist Scottish business to prepare for the introduction of the euro, and supports the Executive in its aim to increase the sustainable growth of the Scottish economy over the long term." Supported by: Lewis Macdonald*
